'''Angie''' is a barista who was burned when an espresso machine exploded at her work.

==History==
While working at a coffee shop, Angie sustained second-degree burns on her chest, neck, and face when an espresso machine exploded. She was brought into the hospital so that her burns could be treated.

==Relationships==
===Professional===
When she was informed that [[Devin]] had asked about her, she asked who Devin was. She was completely unaware that he had a crush on her and believed his feelings were reciprocated.

==Career==
Angie is a barista. She was working when an espresso machine exploded, burning her chest, neck, and face. In the emergency room, she was worried that she had burned her own face, struggling to remember if she had checked the over-pressure valve that day or if it had been the day before. She said her job was not enough pay and too much pressure.

==Notes and Trivia==
*She was 24 at the time of her hospitalization.
